name: Eofol
desc: A civilian commoner suffering from severe degradation.

name: Alf
desc: An average civilian suffering from degradation.

name: Lykon
desc: An average lykon civilian.

name: Queiza
desc: An average queizan civilian.

name: Chiylo
desc: An average chiylo civilian.

name: Lady
desc:
Adopted heir to a ruling house.
Harbors untapped potential.

name: Lady Lady
desc:
Successor to the Lady of the Lake, blessed with granting the power of Excalibur.
Race: Queiza

name: Lieutenant
desc:
Loyal retainer for a noble house.
Race: Alf

name: Heiress
desc:
Heir to a fallen house with
renewed passion to reclaim it.
Race: Queiza

name: Wolf Prince
desc:
A distant heir to the Kingdom of Masa trained to ride upon a great wolf.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Wolf

name: Shinobi
desc:
An exiled master of stealth
and espionage.
Race: Nordak

name: Seiryuchi
desc:
One who has inherited the power
of a dragon of life.
Race: Nordak

name: Water Lord
desc:
Noble heir to a ruling house.
Harbors untapped potential.
Race: Queiza

name: Pirate Lord
desc:
Ruler of a gang of pirates.
Wields incredible power.
Race: Queiza

name: Knight Lord
desc:
Heir to a fallen house devoting his life as a knight for his nation.
Race: Alf, Mount: Horse

name: Commander
desc:
A lord and high ranked Commander of the Knights of Masa.
Race: Alf, Mount: Horse

name: Holy Princess
desc:
Crown Princess of the Kingdom of
Masa, acting as a holy beacon of hope.
Race: Lykon

name: Holy Princess
desc:
Crown Princess of the Kingdom of
Masa, renowned as a great sage.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Unicorn

name: High Priestess
desc: Mages gifted with visions of the future.

name: Mercenary
desc:
Well-balanced professional soldiers-for-hire.
Race: Chiylo

name: Brave
desc:
Seasoned veterans with remarkable skill.
Race: Chiylo

name: Lionheart
desc:
Seasoned veterans with remarkable skill.
Race: Zabos

name: Nomad
desc:
Wanderers who roam the wild
proving their skill with the blade.
Race: Lykon

name: Blade Dancer
desc:
Lightning-fast wielder of the blade,
possesses peerless and lethal skill.
Race: Lykon

name: Shinobi
desc:
Masters of stealth and espionage.
Race: Alf

name: Ninja
desc:
Shinobi who have become skilled
fighters as well.
Race: Alf

name: Soldier
desc:
Foot soldiers who prefer thrusting
attacks and swift movement.
Race: Chiylo

name: Fencer
desc:
Footsoldier of Omyrus skilled with a Rapier.
Race: Queiza

name: Captain
desc:
Advanced soldiers capable of fighting on land and sea.
Race: Queiza

name: Fighter
desc:
Defenders of justice who are strong and bulky, yet somewhat slow.
Race: Chiylo

name: Warrior
desc: Determined fighters who relish battle.

name: Brigand
desc:
Ruffians who pillage and plunder at their leasure.
Race: Lykon

name: Berserker
desc: Devotees of the axe. Relentless savages that deliver devastating stikes.

name: Pirate
desc:
Free spirited brawlers who call the seas their home.
Race: Chiylo

name: Privateer
desc:
Elite brawlers who sail the seas
and fighting for whoever pays.
Race: Chiylo

name: Hunter
desc:
Wanderers who roam the wild
hunting for game.
Race: Lykon

name: Marksman
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Guard
desc: Heavily armored knights with poor movement.

name: Vanguard
desc: Veteran horse knights.

name: Nurse
desc:
A healer-in-training skilled in Aquis magic and staves.
Race: Queiza

name: Doctor
desc:
An advanced healer able to repair severe injuries with surgical precision.
Race: Queiza

name: Clergy
desc:
Member of the clergy who heals
allies and fights with magic.
Race: Lykon

name: Prior
desc:
Leader of a local church ready to defend the honor of the goddess.
Race: Lykon

name: Street Rat
desc:
One who has been forced to
learn to steal to survive.
Race: Queiza

name: Apprentice
desc:
Magic wielders with solid skills
but low physical strength.
Race: Queiza

name: Sage
desc:
An experienced wielder of the
magical arts on the battlefield.
Race: Queiza

name: Scholar
desc:
Wielders of magic who are stronger,
but slower, than apprentices.
Race: Avyon

name: Dancer
desc:
Dancers whose powers revitalize
their allies. Can fight, but not strong.
Race: Zabos

name: Cavalry
desc:
Mounted knights with swift movement.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Horse

name: Paladin
desc:
Holy knights who fight for kingdom
and church alike.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Horse

name: Barbarian
desc:
Uncivilized warriors who ride upon
great wolves to prove their might.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Wolf

name: Marauder
desc:
Crazed warriors with lust
for blood and glory.
Race: Lykon

name: Wolf Nomad
desc:
Wandering Lykon wolf rider skilled at blade and bow.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Wolf

name: Wolf Knight
desc:
Knights of Masa trained to fight
while riding vicious wolves.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Wolf

name: Scout
desc:
Ranged knights who ride out to
deliver messages.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Horse

name: Ranger
desc:
Wandering mercenaries skilled in
bow, sword, and horseback.
Race: Chiylo, Mount: Horse

name: WindRider
desc: Knights who soar through the skies.

name: Falcon Knight
desc: Veteran pegasus knights.

name: Tactician
desc: Mounted tactical genius who fight from the back with magic.

name: Saint
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: Recruit
desc: Mounted knights with superior movement.

name: Journeyman
desc: Young fighters with high expectations.

name: Revenant
desc:
Walking corpses that move slowly
but attack with sharp claws.

name: Entombed
desc:
Reanimated corpses. They're not fast,
but their talons rend flesh with ease.

name: Bonewalker
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Wight
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Bonewalker
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Wight
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Mogall
desc:
Perilous floating orbs filled with
blighting dark magic.

name: Arch Mogall
desc: A summoned phantom.
